Definition: In this task, you are given a context sentence containing a blank (_). You are expected to fill the blank with one word to make the sentence convey a cultural stereotype. A stereotype is an over-generalized belief about a particular group of people. Your answer must not contain more than one word.#AParticularGroup #SentenceStereotypeAnswer #ThisTask #OneWord #TheBlank #ABlank(_ #People #AnOver-GeneralizedBelief #AContextSentence #ContainSentence_Word #ACulturalStereotype #YourAnswer #Sentence_Word

Positive Examples.explanation: Cameroon are tropical is an existing and valid stereotype.
Commanders are brave is an existing and valid stereotype.

Negative Examples.input: Context: I get along well with all the _ Norweigan people.
Negative Examples.explanation: It is not a valid stereotype because black people is not the majority or a representative population of Norway.
It is not a valid stereotype because there is no correlation between Bengali man being cold.
